H0.text: What is the fin called underneath the rear of a surfboard. Rudder

H1.text: What is the fin called underneath the rear of a surfboard. Stabilizer

H2.text: What is the fin called underneath the rear of a surfboard. Keel

H3.text: What is the fin called underneath the rear of a surfboard. Skeg

A4.text: In more recent years, the name has been used for a fin on a surfboard which improves directional stability

A5.text: A skeg (or skegg or skag) is a sternward extension of the keel of boats and ships which have a rudder mounted on the centre line
